Sentencas: The aim of this paper was to investigate the viability of steam reforming the combined glycerol and water by-product streams of a biodiesel plant.
Titulo: Steam reforming of biodiesel by-product to make renewable hydrogen

Sentencas: A platinum alumina catalyst was used to optimise the operating conditions for glycerol steam reforming and mass spectroscopy was chosen to measure reformer gas yield.
Titulo: Steam reforming of biodiesel by-product to make renewable hydrogen

Sentencas: The problem is that glycerol steam reforming is relatively untested even with pure glycerol and the by-product quality may be too poor.
Titulo: Steam reforming of biodiesel by-product to make renewable hydrogen

Sentencas: The strategy was therefore to optimise the process using pure glycerol and compare the performance with by-product glycerol.
Titulo: Steam reforming of biodiesel by-product to make renewable hydrogen

Sentencas: To test catalyst degradation caused by carbon deposition, a Solid Oxide fuel cell (SOFC) was used as a separate reformer and electrical performance was measured to indicate carbon deposition.
Titulo: Steam reforming of biodiesel by-product to make renewable hydrogen

Sentencas: This is the first time a SOFC has been run on glycerol.
Titulo: Steam reforming of biodiesel by-product to make renewable hydrogen

Sentencas: The results showed that thermodynamic theory can be used to predict reformer performance.
Titulo: Steam reforming of biodiesel by-product to make renewable hydrogen

Sentencas: At high temperatures high gas yield can be reached (almost 100%) and selectivities of 70% (dry basis) obtained.
Titulo: Steam reforming of biodiesel by-product to make renewable hydrogen

Sentencas: The optimum conditions for glycerol reforming were 860 degrees C temperature (maximum tested), 0.12 mols/min glycerol flow per kg of catalyst and 2.5 steam/carbon ratio.
Titulo: Steam reforming of biodiesel by-product to make renewable hydrogen

Sentencas: Reforming catalysts lasted for several days of continuous operation with minimal degradation, 0.4% of feed deposited.
Titulo: Steam reforming of biodiesel by-product to make renewable hydrogen

Sentencas: By-product glycerol performed slightly worse with a lower yield and more carbon deposition, 2% of feed.
Titulo: Steam reforming of biodiesel by-product to make renewable hydrogen

Sentencas: The results show that glycerol steam reforming is a viable alternative use for glycerol and potentially a better option than purification.
Titulo: Steam reforming of biodiesel by-product to make renewable hydrogen
